doc:
Richard X. Slattery https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_X._Slattery 0 Richard Xavier Slattery (June 26, 1925 – January 27, 1997) was an American character actor in film, theater and television. Slattery appeared in such films as A Distant Trumpet, The Boston Strangler, Walking Tall, The No Mercy Man and Herbie Rides Again. Richard_Xavier_Slattery ( June_26_,_1925 – January_27_,_1997 ) was an_American_character_actor in film_,_theater_and_television . Slattery appeared in such_films as A_Distant_Trumpet , The_Boston_Strangler , Walking Tall , The_No_Mercy_Man and Herbie_Rides_Again .
